articles.description: Houston's winning play against Purdue in the Sweet 16 was designed for L.J. Cryer. But a bit of improvisation gave UH the win.
articles.content: Houston guard Milos Uzan, right, reacts toward forward J'Wan Roberts after hitting a 3-pointer during the second half of a Midwest Regional semifinal basketball game in the NCAA Tournament at Lucas O… [+25882 chars]

articles.author: Larry Brooks
articles.title: Rangers blow late two-goal lead in crushing overtime loss to Ducks - New York Post
articles.description: “Good teams do not lose a game like that,” Adam Fox said after the Rangers’ 5-4 overtime loss to the Ducks in which they blew a 4-2 lead.
articles.content: ANAHEIM Adam Fox makes it a practice not to say too much but No. 23 pretty much said it all after the Rangers somehow blew a two-goal lead within the final six minutes of the third period only to los… [+3797 chars]
